alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 19 at 3:54AM EDT until October 20 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 to 32 degrees possible. * WHERE...Portions of north central, northeast and northwest Ohio and northwest Pennsylvania. * WHEN...From this evening through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
